job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pThis position is remote ppbr ppDataPrime is looking for an energetic data scientist with the desire to work with a tightlyknit team supporting the development and production of cuttingedge AI amp ML capabilities The ideal candidate will apply expert knowledge in statistical analysis complex data mining and artificial intelligence to generate valuable insights from the data They will provide subject matter expertise relating to the data mining and analysis of data from a range of sources to transform raw data into concise and actionable insights The candidate will design and implement datadriven solutions with specific focus on advanced analytical methods data models and visualizationsnbsp ppbr ppThe ideal candidate will develop quantitative simulations and models to provide descriptive and predictive analytics solution recommendations Finally they will identify trends and problems through complex big data analysis and will maintain current in emerging tools and techniques in machine learning statistical modeling and analytics ppbr ppstrongMinimum Qualificationsstrong pullipBS in Statistics Applied Mathematics Data Science Computer Science Operations Research or other closely related quantitative or mathematical discipline plilipFour 4 years of relevant experience in applied research big data analytics statistics applied mathematics data science computer science operations research or other closely related quantitative or mathematical discipline plilipAt least three 2 years of direct experience in machine learning plilipDemonstrates knowledge of data mining methods databases data visualization and machine learning plilipAbility to communicate analysis techniques concepts and products plilipAbility to develop datadriven solutions data models and visualizations pliulpbr ppstrongnbspPreferred Qualificationsstrong pullipAdvanced Degree MS or PhD in Statistics Applied Mathematics Data Science Computer Science Operations Research or other closely related quantitative or mathematical discipline A PhD degree may be substituted for up to three 3 years of relevant experience plilipExperience with opensource cloud tools eg Docker Kubernetes OpenStack plilipExperience with public cloud eg AWS Azure security plilipSoftware Development Experience any language pliulpbr ppemDataPrime is committed to a diverse and inclusive workplace DataPrime  is an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of race national origin gender gender identity sexual orientation protected veteran status disability age or other legally
